meanings.definition: Capable of being thought about or considered.
meanings.sent1: The idea was cogitable, so I pondered it carefully.
meanings.sent2: The concept was cogitable, and I could easily understand it.
meanings.sent3: It was a cogitable notion, so I couldn't help but mull it over.
meanings.sent4: Her cogitable proposal sparked a flurry of discussions.
meanings.sent5: The cogitable image stayed in my mind long after I saw it.

meanings.definition: Able to be imagined or conceived.
meanings.sent1: The story's plot was cogitable, making it easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The fantastical world was cogitable, allowing me to picture it clearly.
meanings.sent3: His cogitable invention left everyone in awe of his creativity.
meanings.sent4: The artist's cogitable masterpiece captured the essence of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The cogitable dream felt so real, I didn't want to wake up.
